tool_description:
Extracts data from GST Certificate instantly and accurately.

IDfy’s  GST Certificate OCR API extracts data from an image of the GST Certificate. It accurately auto-fills this data in the right fields for a quicker & errorless form-filling experience.
name: GST certificate OCR
title: GST certificate OCR

api_list.name: GST Certificate OCR
api_list.description:
Extracts data from GST Certificate instantly and accurately.

IDfy’s  GST Certificate OCR API extracts data from an image of the GST Certificate. It accurately auto-fills this data in the right fields for a quicker & errorless form-filling experience.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gst-certificate-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_gst_certificate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gst-certificate-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gst-certificate-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_gst_certificate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gst-certificate-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
